mapper.insert: MERGE INTO yquiz1 USING dual ON (y_id = #{y_id}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET y_name = #{y_name} ,sex = #{sex}, country_name = #{country_name}, city_name = #{city_name}, y_date = #{y_date} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (y_id, y_name, sex, country_name,city_name, y_date) VALUES (#{y_id},#{y_name},#{sex},#{country_name},#{city_name},sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from yquiz1 order by y_date desc
